____________________


1: Uninstall all Visual C++ x64 versions from your PC and keep only x86 versions
2: Install NetFramework 4.0 Client
3: Disable UAC
4: ***
5: Update your Video card driver and turn on most settings from CPanel of card at 3D Settings 
6: If you have nVidia video card switch to Single Display Peformance Mode from 3D Settings.
7: Move your Game on other partition like D:
8: Run game as administrator.

@ supcena 

1: Uninstall all Visual C++ x64 versions from your PC and keep only x86 versions
2: Install NetFramework 4.0 Client and Visual C++ 2010 x86 version
3: Disable UAC
4: Close (logout) from STEAM when you try to play nosteam games
5: Update your Video card driver and turn on most settings from CPanel of card at 3D Settings 
6: If you have nVidia video card switch to Single Display Peformance Mode from 3D Settings.
7: Move your Game on other partition like D:
8: Run game as administrator.
tou're my heros ^^nosteam^^

game works fine and very smoothly, this is excellent! thank you very much nosTEAM i will definitely be obtaining more of your torrents! one thing though; when i first began playing the graphics looked like pure crap (and i knew it wasnt my video card because i have games that require higher graphics to play that look marvelous), but then i started to investigate and [if you are also having the same problem] what you do is go to where you installed fifa 13 (the folder/place/etc.), click on "FIFA 13", then click on "Game", then "fifasetup", then find an application called "fifaconfig" (without the quotes of course), click on it. now another window will appear where you will click "Game Settings". another window will then also pop up where you will make the resolution the highest listed (in my case it was 1600x900, before when graphics were crappy it was on 800x600). also ake sure the frame rate is unlimited or on "no limit fps" (same thing). one last thing i did which im not really sure did anything was put the rendering quality on high... not sure if it affects graphics but yeah that pretty sums it all up thank you once again nosTEAM.

well i have some steps to install fifa for those who are still having issues

1-Install the game first

2-Download the reloded crack it is 28mb approx and copy the cracked files to game directory

3-Make sure if that your graphic cards are updated...to update go to there website

4-Make sure that you have at least directx9 or higher..

5-Make sure that microsoft net frame work latest version is installed on your pc

6-Make sure that you have uninstalled all versions of visual c++ x64 versions and only
have visual c++ 2008 x86 version and microsoft c++ 2010 x86 version
you can download them by using google

7-Thats it if you have any questions i will love to help you guys
